ground_truth: A balding undercover officer knocks on the cellblock door. In his cell, Dillinger flips through a magazine and looks up as the balding officer leads Purvis into the cellblock, where other lawmen observe from a side table. Wearing a crisp suit, Purvis faces Dillinger's cell. The gang leader sets down his magazine, stands, and ambles toward the bars. The two men size each other up, with Dillinger curiously cocking his head and Purvis staring calmly. The other officers and agents watch closely. Dillinger's eyes flick up and down the stoic G-man, and he shakes his head with his brow knit. Blinking furtively, Purvis allows a faint smile. Dillinger straightens to his full height, chewing gum and giving a cocky smile. Purvis pauses on his way out, facing Dillinger as sunlight outlines his clean-shaven face, and Dillinger follows Purvis from inside his cell. Both men walk with their hands in pockets, and Purvis barely slows his leisurely stride while inspecting Dillinger, then leaves with his agents. The balding officer stays behind as Dillinger chews his gum. A three-propeller plane cruises through the sky with its curved, boxy underbelly hanging below thick wings, a chevron-shaped windshield jutting behind the nose, and six windows serving as skylights over the cockpit. Later, the plane descends toward a rainy airfield, and on board, Dillinger jostles in his seat as the plane touches down. Outside, the plane taxies past distant hangars, and near one, a man lights a flare, illuminating a vast crowd as two journalists crank movie cameras. A black-and-white view through one camera shows a police officer waiting as Dillinger's plane approaches. Other journalists wait with flashbulb cameras, and three lawmen hold rifles at the ready, gleaming in the flare's light. The plane taxies to a stop as lawmen debark from a car, and another flare goes up. Wind whips two trench-coated lawmen as they escort a shackled Dillinger across the tarmac, with flashbulbs popping. Wearing a button-down shirt and open vest, Dillinger stumbles forward, jostled by his retinue of armed men, his wet bangs dangling over his face. A plume of smoke from a glowing flare billows crookedly in the wind as another view through a movie camera shows the lawmen leading Dillinger through the haze. More flashbulbs pop as the men reach a sedan with a sleek bird-winged hood ornament, and Dillinger gets shoved into the back seat. A jerky hand-held view shows a gunman climbing in next to him. In front, two policemen stand on a car's running boards as it starts off, accompanied by officers on motorbikes. Inside the prisoner's car, Dillinger slouches, his head bobbing while passing lights gleam on the car's polished black hood. Seated between two of his captors, Dillinger keeps his pensive gaze aimed downward.

test_cases.name: Synonym Substitution
test_cases.description: A thinning covert operative raps on the prison door. In his cell, Dillinger thumbs through a periodical and glances up as the thinning operative brings Purvis into the prison, where other officers see from a nearby table. Donning a neat suit, Purvis confronts Dillinger's cell. The mob leader places down his periodical, rises, and strolls toward the bars. The two men assess each other, with Dillinger inquisitively tilting his head and Purvis gazing serenely. The other operatives and agents observe intently. Dillinger's eyes dart up and down the impassive G-man, and he shakes his head with his brow furrowed. Blinking stealthily, Purvis permits a faint grin. Dillinger straightens to his full stature, chewing gum and flashing an arrogant grin. Purvis hesitates on his way out, facing Dillinger as sunlight outlines his clean-shaven visage, and Dillinger follows Purvis from inside his cell. Both men stride with their hands in pockets, and Purvis barely slows his unhurried pace while surveying Dillinger, then departs with his agents. The thinning operative remains behind as Dillinger chews his gum. A tri-prop plane glides through the sky with its curved, boxy underside hanging beneath bulky wings, a V-shaped windshield protruding behind the nose, and six windows functioning as skylights over the cockpit. Later, the plane descends toward a rainy airfield, and on board, Dillinger jostles in his seat as the plane lands. Outside, the plane rolls past distant hangars, and near one, a man ignites a flare, illuminating a vast crowd as two reporters crank film cameras. A monochrome view through one camera shows a police officer waiting as Dillinger's plane nears. Other reporters wait with flashbulb cameras, and three officers hold rifles at the ready, gleaming in the flare's light. The plane rolls to a halt as officers disembark from a car, and another flare ascends. Wind lashes two trench-coated officers as they accompany a shackled Dillinger across the tarmac, with flashbulbs bursting. Wearing a button-down shirt and open vest, Dillinger stumbles forward, jostled by his retinue of armed men, his wet locks hanging over his face. A plume of smoke from a glowing flare billows crookedly in the wind as another view through a film camera shows the officers leading Dillinger through the mist. More flashbulbs burst as the men reach a sedan with a sleek avian-winged hood ornament, and Dillinger gets pushed into the back seat. A shaky hand-held view shows a gunman climbing in beside him. In front, two policemen stand on a car's running boards as it moves off, accompanied by officers on motorcycles. Inside the prisoner's car, Dillinger slouches, his head bobbing while passing lights reflect on the car's shiny black hood. Seated between two of his captors, Dillinger keeps his thoughtful gaze directed downward.

Inside the prisoner's car, Dillinger slouches, his head bobbing while lights gleam on the polished black hood. Seated between two captors, a pensive gaze is kept by Dillinger, aimed downward.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L1
test_cases.description:
A balding undercover officer, with a noticeable lack of hair, approaches and knocks on the heavy cellblock door. Inside his cell, Dillinger, the notorious gang leader, casually flips through the pages of a magazine, only to look up with interest as the balding officer escorts Purvis into the cellblock area. Here, other lawmen are already present, observing the scene from a side table. Purvis, dressed impeccably in a crisp, well-tailored suit, positions himself directly in front of Dillinger's cell. Dillinger, setting aside his magazine, rises to his feet and ambles leisurely toward the bars. The two men engage in a silent exchange, sizing each other up, with Dillinger curiously cocking his head to one side while Purvis maintains a calm, steady stare. The other officers and agents watch the interaction closely, their eyes fixed on the unfolding scene. Dillinger's eyes flicker up and down the stoic G-man, and he shakes his head slightly, his brow furrowed in thought. Blinking furtively, Purvis allows a faint, almost imperceptible smile to cross his lips. Dillinger then straightens to his full height, chewing gum with a nonchalant air and offering a cocky smile. As Purvis makes his way out, he pauses momentarily, facing Dillinger, with sunlight outlining his clean-shaven face, and Dillinger follows Purvis with his gaze from inside his cell. Both men walk with their hands casually tucked into their pockets, and Purvis barely slows his leisurely stride while continuing to inspect Dillinger, before finally leaving with his agents. The balding officer remains behind as Dillinger continues to chew his gum thoughtfully. 

Meanwhile, a three-propeller plane cruises gracefully through the sky, its curved, boxy underbelly hanging below the thick wings, a chevron-shaped windshield jutting prominently behind the nose, and six windows serving as skylights over the cockpit. Later, the plane descends toward a rain-soaked airfield, and on board, Dillinger jostles in his seat as the plane makes contact with the ground. Outside, the plane taxies past distant hangars, and near one, a man lights a flare, casting an illuminating glow over a vast crowd as two journalists crank their movie cameras. A black-and-white view through one camera lens shows a police officer waiting patiently as Dillinger's plane approaches. Other journalists stand ready with flashbulb cameras, and three lawmen hold rifles at the ready, their barrels gleaming in the flare's light. The plane comes to a stop as lawmen disembark from a nearby car, and another flare is sent up into the air. Wind whips around two trench-coated lawmen as they escort a shackled Dillinger across the tarmac, with flashbulbs popping incessantly. Wearing a button-down shirt and an open vest, Dillinger stumbles forward, jostled by his retinue of armed men, his wet bangs dangling over his face. A plume of smoke from a glowing flare billows crookedly in the wind as another view through a movie camera captures the lawmen leading Dillinger through the haze. More flashbulbs pop as the men reach a sedan with a sleek bird-winged hood ornament, and Dillinger is unceremoniously shoved into the back seat. A jerky hand-held view shows a gunman climbing in next to him. In front, two policemen stand on the car's running boards as it starts off, accompanied by officers on motorbikes. Inside the prisoner's car, Dillinger slouches, his head bobbing slightly while passing lights gleam on the car's polished black hood. Seated between two of his captors, Dillinger keeps his pensive gaze aimed downward, lost in thought.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L2
test_cases.description:
A balding undercover officer, characterized by his noticeable lack of hair, approaches with a sense of purpose and knocks firmly on the solid, heavy cellblock door. Within the confines of his cell, Dillinger, the infamous and notorious gang leader, casually flips through the glossy pages of a magazine. His interest piqued, he looks up just in time to see the balding officer escort Purvis into the cellblock area, where other lawmen are already present, seated and observing the unfolding scene from a side table with keen interest. Purvis, dressed impeccably in a crisp, well-tailored suit that exudes professionalism, positions himself squarely in front of Dillinger's cell. With deliberate movements, Dillinger sets aside his magazine, rises to his feet, and ambles leisurely toward the bars. The two men engage in a silent exchange, each sizing the other up, with Dillinger curiously cocking his head to one side while Purvis maintains a calm and steady stare. The other officers and agents closely watch the interaction, their eyes riveted on the unfolding scene. Dillinger's eyes flicker up and down the stoic G-man, and he shakes his head slightly, a furrow forming on his brow as he contemplates. Blinking furtively, Purvis allows a faint, almost imperceptible smile to play across his lips. Dillinger then straightens to his full height, chewing gum with an air of nonchalance and offering a cocky smile. As Purvis turns to make his way out, he pauses momentarily, facing Dillinger, with the sunlight outlining his clean-shaven face, and Dillinger follows him with his gaze from inside the confines of his cell. Both men walk with their hands casually tucked into their pockets, and Purvis barely slows his leisurely stride while continuing to inspect Dillinger, before finally departing with his agents. The balding officer remains behind as Dillinger continues to chew his gum thoughtfully, lost in his own reflections.

Meanwhile, a magnificent three-propeller plane cruises gracefully through the expansive sky. Its curved, boxy underbelly hangs below the sturdy, thick wings, while a chevron-shaped windshield juts prominently behind the nose, and six windows serve as skylights over the cockpit, allowing light to filter in. Later, the plane begins its descent toward a rain-soaked airfield, and on board, Dillinger jostles in his seat as the plane makes contact with the ground. Outside, the plane taxies past distant hangars, and near one, a man strikes a flare, casting an illuminating glow over the vast, assembled crowd as two journalists crank their movie cameras with anticipation. A black-and-white view through one camera lens captures a police officer waiting patiently as Dillinger's plane approaches. Other journalists stand ready with flashbulb cameras, and three lawmen hold their rifles at the ready, the barrels gleaming in the brilliant flare's light. The plane eventually comes to a stop as lawmen disembark from a nearby car, and another flare is sent up into the air, lighting the scene vividly. The wind whips around two trench-coated lawmen as they escort a shackled Dillinger across the tarmac, with flashbulbs popping incessantly. Wearing a button-down shirt and an open vest, Dillinger stumbles forward, jostled slightly by his retinue of armed men, his wet bangs dangling messily over his face. A plume of smoke from a glowing flare billows crookedly in the wind as another view through a movie camera captures the lawmen leading Dillinger through the smoky haze. More flashbulbs pop as the men reach a sleek sedan adorned with a bird-winged hood ornament. Dillinger is unceremoniously shoved into the back seat. A jerky hand-held view shows a gunman climbing in next to him. In front, two policemen stand on the car's running boards as it starts off, the vehicle accompanied by officers on motorbikes. Inside the prisoner's car, Dillinger slouches, his head bobbing slightly with the car’s motion, while passing lights gleam on the vehicle's polished black hood. Seated between two of his captors, Dillinger keeps his pensive gaze aimed downward, seemingly lost in thought.

test_cases.name: Macro-Actions -> Micro-Actions
test_cases.description: A balding undercover officer approaches the cellblock door and knocks firmly, creating a resonant sound that echoes through the corridor. Inside his cell, Dillinger, the notorious gang leader, casually flips through the pages of a magazine, his fingers deftly turning each page. As he hears the knock, he looks up with mild curiosity just as the balding officer opens the door and steps aside to allow Purvis to enter the cellblock. Purvis, dressed impeccably in a crisp suit, strides in with an air of authority, while other lawmen, stationed at a side table, observe the unfolding scene with keen interest. Purvis positions himself directly in front of Dillinger's cell, his posture erect and composed. Noticing the new arrival, Dillinger places his magazine down with deliberate care, rises from his seated position, and ambles toward the bars with a casual yet deliberate gait. As the two men stand face-to-face, they engage in a silent exchange, sizing each other up with Dillinger curiously cocking his head to one side, while Purvis maintains a calm, unwavering stare. The other officers and agents remain attentive, their eyes fixed on the interaction. Dillinger's gaze travels up and down the stoic G-man, his eyes narrowing slightly as he shakes his head, his brow furrowed in thought. Purvis, blinking furtively, allows a faint smile to play on his lips, a subtle acknowledgment of the moment. Dillinger then straightens to his full height, his posture exuding confidence as he chews gum with a cocky smile. As Purvis turns to leave, he pauses momentarily, facing Dillinger once more, the sunlight casting a sharp outline around his clean-shaven face. Dillinger, from within his cell, follows Purvis with his eyes, both men walking with their hands casually tucked into their pockets. Purvis maintains his leisurely stride, barely slowing as he continues to inspect Dillinger, before finally exiting with his agents. The balding officer remains behind, standing watch as Dillinger continues to chew his gum thoughtfully. Meanwhile, a three-propeller plane cruises through the sky, its curved, boxy underbelly hanging below thick wings, a chevron-shaped windshield jutting prominently behind the nose, and six windows serving as skylights over the cockpit. Later, the plane begins its descent toward a rain-soaked airfield, and inside, Dillinger jostles slightly in his seat as the plane makes contact with the ground. Outside, the plane taxies past distant hangars, and near one, a man ignites a flare, casting a bright glow over a vast crowd as two journalists crank their movie cameras into action. Through the black-and-white view of one camera, a police officer stands waiting as Dillinger's plane approaches. Other journalists, equipped with flashbulb cameras, stand ready, while three lawmen, their rifles gleaming in the flare's light, hold their weapons at the ready. The plane comes to a halt as lawmen disembark from a nearby car, and another flare is sent up, illuminating the scene. The wind whips around two trench-coated lawmen as they escort a shackled Dillinger across the tarmac, the flashbulbs popping incessantly. Dillinger, wearing a button-down shirt and an open vest, stumbles forward, jostled by the retinue of armed men surrounding him, his wet bangs hanging limply over his face. A plume of smoke from the glowing flare billows crookedly in the wind, and another view through a movie camera captures the lawmen leading Dillinger through the haze. More flashbulbs explode in rapid succession as the group reaches a sedan adorned with a sleek bird-winged hood ornament, and Dillinger is unceremoniously shoved into the back seat. A jerky hand-held camera view shows a gunman climbing in next to him, securing the prisoner. In the front, two policemen stand on the car's running boards as it begins to move, accompanied by officers on motorbikes flanking the vehicle. Inside the prisoner's car, Dillinger slouches in his seat, his head bobbing slightly with the car's motion, while passing lights cast gleams on the car's polished black hood. Seated between two of his captors, Dillinger keeps his gaze pensive and aimed downward, lost in thought as the car speeds away.

test_cases.description:
An undercover officer knocks on the cellblock door, leading Purvis into the area where other lawmen observe. In his cell, Dillinger sets aside his magazine and approaches the bars to face Purvis, who stands in a crisp suit. The two men size each other up, with Dillinger curiously cocking his head and Purvis maintaining a calm demeanor. A three-propeller plane flies through the sky, later descending toward a rainy airfield. Onboard, Dillinger jostles in his seat as the plane lands and taxis past hangars. Dillinger, in a button-down shirt and open vest, stumbles forward, jostled by armed men, his wet bangs hanging over his face. More flashbulbs pop as they reach a sedan with a bird-winged hood ornament, and Dillinger is shoved into the back seat. A gunman climbs in next to him, while two policemen stand on the car's running boards as it departs, accompanied by officers on motorbikes. Inside, Dillinger slouches between his captors, his head bobbing as passing lights reflect on the car's polished hood, his gaze pensive and downward.

test_cases.name: Insert Attributes, Emotions and Scene
test_cases.description: A balding undercover officer, known for his years of experience in covert operations within the city's crime unit, knocks on the cellblock door. In his cell, Dillinger, the infamous bank robber with a notorious reputation during the Great Depression, flips through a magazine and looks up as the balding officer leads Purvis, the determined FBI agent known for his role in capturing high-profile gangsters, into the cellblock, where other lawmen, part of the joint task force assembled to take down Dillinger, observe from a side table. Wearing a crisp suit, indicative of his polished image, Purvis faces Dillinger's cell. The gang leader, whose daring escapes from jail have been widely publicized, sets down his magazine, stands, and ambles toward the bars. The two men size each other up, with Dillinger curiously cocking his head and Purvis staring calmly, a common tactic to maintain authority in such tense encounters. The other officers and agents watch closely, aware that this meeting could set the tone for their investigation. Dillinger's eyes flick up and down the stoic G-man, and he shakes his head with his brow knit. Blinking furtively, Purvis allows a faint smile, a rare show of emotion from the typically reserved agent. Dillinger straightens to his full height, chewing gum with the nonchalance of a man who has eluded capture multiple times, and gives a cocky smile. Purvis pauses on his way out, facing Dillinger as sunlight outlines his clean-shaven face, a symbol of his disciplined and strategic approach, and Dillinger follows Purvis from inside his cell. Both men walk with their hands in pockets, a gesture reflecting their mutual intent to maintain control of the situation, and Purvis barely slows his leisurely stride while inspecting Dillinger, then leaves with his agents. The balding officer, trusted with ensuring the security of the cellblock, stays behind as Dillinger chews his gum. A three-propeller plane, similar to the Model 10 Electra known for its reliability during the 1930s, cruises through the sky with its curved, boxy underbelly hanging below thick wings, a chevron-shaped windshield jutting behind the nose, and six windows serving as skylights over the cockpit. Later, the plane descends toward a rainy airfield, a hub for various law enforcement operations, and on board, Dillinger jostles in his seat as the plane touches down. Outside, the plane taxies past distant hangars, and near one, a man lights a flare, a common method used to signal aircraft in poor visibility, illuminating a vast crowd as two journalists crank movie cameras, capturing the historic moment. A black-and-white view through one camera shows a police officer waiting as Dillinger's plane approaches. Other journalists wait with flashbulb cameras, eager to document the latest chapter in Dillinger’s saga, and three lawmen hold rifles at the ready, gleaming in the flare's light, prepared for any attempts at escape. The plane taxies to a stop as lawmen debark from a car, and another flare goes up, signaling the commencement of Dillinger’s transfer. Wind whips two trench-coated lawmen as they escort a shackled Dillinger across the tarmac, with flashbulbs popping, capturing the tense scene for newspapers nationwide. Wearing a button-down shirt and open vest, Dillinger stumbles forward, jostled by his retinue of armed men, his wet bangs dangling over his face, a reminder of the relentless rain and his grim situation. A plume of smoke from a glowing flare billows crookedly in the wind as another view through a movie camera shows the lawmen leading Dillinger through the haze. More flashbulbs pop as the men reach a sedan with a sleek bird-winged hood ornament, a symbol of luxury and power of the era, and Dillinger gets shoved into the back seat. A jerky hand-held view shows a gunman climbing in next to him. In front, two policemen stand on a car's running boards, a practice common for added security during transport, as it starts off, accompanied by officers on motorbikes, ensuring a secure convoy. Inside the prisoner's car, Dillinger slouches, his head bobbing while passing lights gleam on the car's polished black hood. Seated between two of his captors, Dillinger keeps his pensive gaze aimed downward, contemplating the uncertain future that lies ahead.

test_cases.name: Addition (~50%)
test_cases.description: A balding undercover officer knocks on the cellblock door. In his cell Dillinger flips through a magazine and looks up as the balding officer leads Purvis into the cellblock where other lawmen observe from a side table. Wearing a crisp suit Purvis faces Dillinger's cell. The gang leader sets down his magazine stands and ambles toward the bars. The two men size each other up with Dillinger curiously cocking his head and Purvis staring calmly. The other officers and agents watch closely. Dillinger's eyes flick up and down the stoic Gman and he shakes his head with his brow knit. Blinking furtively Purvis allows a faint smile. Dillinger straightens to his full height chewing gum and giving a cocky smile. Purvis pauses on his way out facing Dillinger as sunlight outlines his cleanshaven face and Dillinger follows Purvis from inside his cell. Both men walk with their hands in pockets and Purvis barely slows his leisurely stride while inspecting. Dillinger then leaves with his agents. The balding officer stays behind as Dillinger chews his gum. A threepropeller plane cruises through the sky with its curved boxy underbelly hanging below thick wings. a chevronshaped windshield jutting behind the nose and six windows serving as skylights over the cockpit. In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. On a bustling 1960s New York street a passionate artist finds unexpected inspiration in the chaotic interplay of urban life capturing moments of love loss and defiant hope on a rainsoaked canvas. Deep in the heart of an enchanted forest a brave knight embarks on a perilous quest to rescue a captive princess facing mythical creatures and treacherous traps with unwavering courage. During a heated political rally in a futuristic city a charismatic leader stokes both hope and dissent. as holographic banners illuminate the night sky and fervent crowds surge with anticipation. In the eerie silence of a postapocalyptic wasteland a hardened survivor scavenges through abandoned ruins haunted by the echoes of a oncethriving civilization now reduced to dust. Beneath the shimmering surface of an underwater kingdom a rebellious mermaid defies ancient traditions to explore forbidden coral reefs and secret caverns brimming with forgotten lore. In the quiet confines of a suburban attic an unassuming teenager stumbles upon a mysterious portal that thrusts him into a surreal world where the very fabric of time and space unravels. On the rugged highlands of Scotland a stoic warrior faces rival clans and ancient curses alike his fierce battle cry resonating across mistcovered moors and turbulent skies. Amid the vibrant chaos of a South American carnival a fearless dancer twirls through streets bursting with color and rhythm each graceful move challenging the rigid boundaries of tradition. Later the plane descends toward a rainy airfield and on board. Dillinger jostles in his seat as the plane touches down. Outside the plane taxies past distant hangars and near one a man lights a flare illuminating a vast crowd as two journalists crank movie cameras. A blackandwhite view through one camera shows a police officer waiting as Dillinger's plane approaches. Other journalists wait with flashbulb cameras and three lawmen hold rifles at the ready gleaming in the flare's light. The plane taxies to a stop as lawmen debark from a car and another flare goes up. Wind whips two trenchcoated lawmen as they escort a shackled Dillinger across the tarmac with flashbulbs popping. Wearing a buttondown shirt and open vest Dillinger stumbles forward jostled by his retinue of armed men. his wet bangs dangling over his face. A plume of smoke from a glowing flare billows crookedly in the wind as another view through a movie camera shows the lawmen leading Dillinger through the haze. More flashbulbs pop as the men reach a sedan with a sleek birdwinged hood ornament and Dillinger gets shoved into the back seat. A jerky handheld view shows a gunman climbing in next to him. In front two policemen stand on a car's running boards as it starts off accompanied by officers on motorbikes. Inside the prisoner's car Dillinger slouches his head bobbing while passing lights gleam on the car's polished black hood. Seated between two of his captors. Dillinger keeps his pensive gaze aimed downward.

test_cases.name: Addition (~80%)
test_cases.description: A balding undercover officer knocks on the cellblock door. In his cell Dillinger flips through a magazine and looks up as the balding officer leads Purvis into the cellblock where other lawmen observe from a side table. Wearing a crisp suit Purvis faces Dillinger's cell. The gang leader sets down his magazine stands and ambles toward the bars. The two men size each other up with Dillinger curiously cocking his head and Purvis staring calmly. The other officers and agents watch closely. Dillinger's eyes flick up and down the stoic Gman and he shakes his head with his brow knit. Blinking furtively Purvis allows a faint smile. Dillinger straightens to his full height chewing gum and giving a cocky smile. Purvis pauses on his way out facing Dillinger as sunlight outlines his cleanshaven face and Dillinger follows Purvis from inside his cell. Both men walk with their hands in pockets and Purvis barely slows his leisurely stride while inspecting. Dillinger then leaves with his agents. The balding officer stays behind as Dillinger chews his gum. A threepropeller plane cruises through the sky with its curved boxy underbelly hanging below thick wings. a chevronshaped windshield jutting behind the nose and six windows serving as skylights over the cockpit. In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Amid the vibrant chaos of a South American carnival a fearless dancer twirls through streets bursting with color and rhythm each graceful move challenging the rigid boundaries of tradition. During a clandestine meeting in a snowcovered mountain lodge two rival spies exchange cryptic messages hinting at an imminent global conspiracy. their whispered words carried off by the howling wind. Inside a lavish 1920s speakeasy a troubled jazz musician pours his soul into a melancholic melody every note echoing the bittersweet memories of lost love and shattered dreams. In a futuristic space station orbiting a distant planet an intrepid crew confronts bizarre alien phenomena and an enigmatic interstellar threat pushing the limits of human endurance. Amidst the chaos of a raging civil war a compassionate medic races through bombedout streets. his every desperate step a race against time to save lives in the midst of utter devastation. On a sundappled afternoon in a quaint European village an eccentric inventor unveils a groundbreaking contraption that defies conventional physics igniting wonder and skepticism in equal measure. In a bustling marketplace in ancient Persia a cunning street thief navigates labyrinthine alleyways and vibrant bazaars. his calculated every move a daring escape from the everwatchful royal guards. Later the plane descends toward a rainy airfield and on board. Dillinger jostles in his seat as the plane touches down. Outside the plane taxies past distant hangars and near one a man lights a flare illuminating a vast crowd as two journalists crank movie cameras. A blackandwhite view through one camera shows a police officer waiting as Dillinger's plane approaches. Other journalists wait with flashbulb cameras and three lawmen hold rifles at the ready gleaming in the flare's light. A plume of smoke from a glowing flare billows crookedly in the wind as another view through a movie camera shows the lawmen leading Dillinger through the haze. More flashbulbs pop as the men reach a sedan with a sleek birdwinged hood ornament and Dillinger gets shoved into the back seat. A jerky handheld view shows a gunman climbing in next to him. In front two policemen stand on a car's running boards as it starts off accompanied by officers on motorbikes. Inside the prisoner's car Dillinger slouches his head bobbing while passing lights gleam on the car's polished black hood. Seated between two of his captors. In his cell Dillinger flips through a magazine and looks up as the balding officer leads Purvis into the cellblock where other lawmen observe from a side table. Dillinger keeps his pensive gaze aimed downward.

test_cases.name: Subject-Action-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: A towering forest ranger scratches on the greenhouse gate. In his greenhouse, Wellington flips through a cookbook and glances up as the forest ranger guides Thorne into the greenhouse, where other gardeners peer from a picnic bench. Clad in a tattered smock, Thorne faces Wellington's greenhouse. The potting expert sets down his cookbook, rises, and strolls toward the trellis. The two challengers size each other up, with Wellington curiously tilting his hat and Thorne gazing serenely. The other botanists and helpers scrutinize intently. Wellington's eyes travel up and down the calm horticulturist, and he shakes his head with his lips pursed. Squinting shyly, Thorne allows a slight grin. Wellington stretches to his full height, munching on a toothpick and flashing a brazen grin. Thorne halts on his exit, facing Wellington as moonlight outlines his unkempt beard, and Wellington shadows Thorne from inside his greenhouse. Both individuals saunter with their hands in sleeves, and Thorne almost halts his relaxed pace while assessing Wellington, then departs with his helpers. The towering ranger remains behind as Wellington chews his toothpick. A multi-blade helicopter drifts through the clouds with its spherical, sleek undercarriage trailing below broad rotors, an arrow-shaped windshield protruding behind the rotor, and eight portholes serving as sunroofs over the cockpit. Later, the helicopter descends toward a foggy helipad, and onboard, Wellington bounces in his hammock as the helicopter lands. Outdoors, the helicopter taxis past remote warehouses, and beside one, a person ignites a lantern, revealing a vast assembly as three reporters crank film cameras. A sepia-toned view through one camera shows an inspector anticipating as Wellington's helicopter draws near. Other reporters wait with flash cameras, and four enforcers grip sabers at the ready, glistening in the lantern's glow. The helicopter taxis to a halt as enforcers disembark from a buggy, and another lantern rises. Wind flutters four trench-coated enforcers as they accompany a shackled Wellington across the runway, with flashlights bursting. Dressed in a checkered sweater and open vest, Wellington bumbles onward, jostled by his entourage of armored individuals, his damp curls hanging over his brow. A puff of vapor from a flickering lantern twists erratically in the wind as another view through a film camera shows the enforcers guiding Wellington through the fog. More flashlights burst as the group reaches a carriage with an elegant falcon-winged hood ornament, and Wellington gets bundled into the rear bench. A shaky hand-held view shows a sniper climbing in beside him. Ahead, two detectives cling to a buggy's railings as it pulls away, pursued by guards on bicycles. Inside the passenger's carriage, Wellington slouches, his hat bobbing while passing shadows dance on the carriage's glossy white roof. Wedged between two of his escort, Wellington keeps his thoughtful stare directed downward.

test_cases.name: Complete Corruption
test_cases.description: The film starts with a man waking up in a small apartment. He prepares coffee and checks his phone for messages. There are none, so he heads out to catch a bus. On the way, he passes a neighbor who greets him briefly. At the bus stop, he notices a group of students talking about an upcoming test. He boards the bus and sits near the back, watching the city pass by outside the window. After a few stops, he gets off near a large office building. He enters the lobby and goes through security. He rides an elevator to the tenth floor, where he works as an assistant. His manager asks him to prepare some documents for a meeting later in the day. He collects files from different departments and organizes them in a conference room. Another employee asks him for help with a software issue, so he takes a few minutes to fix it. Then he returns to the conference room to double-check everything before the meeting begins. The meeting starts at noon. Several people join via video call, and others sit around the table. The manager outlines the project goals, and each team member shares updates on their tasks. There are questions about deadlines and budgets, but no big surprises. After an hour, they end the call. The manager thanks everyone and leaves. The assistant cleans up the room, collects leftover notes, and heads back to his desk. During lunch, he walks to a nearby café, where he orders a simple meal. He eats alone and checks social media on his phone. After lunch, he returns to the office and finishes smaller tasks, such as sending emails and filing paperwork. He also helps a coworker carry boxes of supplies to another floor. Later in the afternoon, the manager calls him in to discuss next week's schedule. They go over a few changes, and the assistant updates the calendar. When the workday ends, he logs off his computer and leaves the building. Outside, he walks a few blocks to meet a friend. They chat about weekend plans and decide to see a film on Saturday. The assistant then heads home on a crowded bus. At his apartment, he sorts his mail, feeds a pet cat, and warms up leftovers for dinner. He watches a short news segment on TV, then checks his phone again. A message from his friend confirms their plan for the weekend. He feels relieved to have something to look forward to. The film ends with him preparing for bed, setting an alarm, and turning off the lights. He reflects briefly on the day, thinking about his tasks, his quiet home, and the plans ahead.

test_cases.name: Summarization
test_cases.description: An undercover officer enters the cellblock, leading Purvis to Dillinger's cell, where lawmen observe. Purvis, in a crisp suit, and Dillinger exchange sizing glances; Dillinger appears curious, while Purvis maintains a calm demeanor. The officers watch closely as Dillinger chews gum with a confident smile, and Purvis exits, leaving Dillinger following his every move from behind the bars. A three-propeller plane flies and later lands on a rainy airfield. Dillinger jostles as it touches down, greeted by a vast crowd and journalists with cameras. Lawmen with rifles wait, and flashbulbs pop as they escort a shackled Dillinger across the tarmac. Wind whips around them, and Dillinger, with wet bangs, stumbles forward through the haze. He's led to a sedan, shoved into the back seat as a gunman sits next to him, while more officers accompany them on motorbikes. Inside, Dillinger slouches, staring downward, his head bobbing as lights reflect on the car's polished hood.
